  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2498</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">And They Lived Happily Ever After</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Und Sie Lebten Glücklich Überhaupt Nachher</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Et Ils Ont vécu Heureusement Toujours Ensuite</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">E Viveram Feliz Sempre Em seguida</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Ed Hanno vissuto Felicemente Mai Dopo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Και έζησαν ευτυχώς πάντα κατόπιν</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Y Vivieron Feliz Siempre Después</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Lesson plans for an assignment for 12th grade students. The students are required to read a prescribed story and to rewrite the ending.Includes rubrics for assessment of the project.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reading</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">text comprehension</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">written expression</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">competence assessment.</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektion plant für eine Anweisung für 12. 
Gradkursteilnehmer. Die Kursteilnehmer werden, eine 
vorgeschriebene Geschichte zu lesen benoetigt und die ending.Includes 
Rubriken für Einschätzung des Projektes neu zu schreiben.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La leçon projette pour une affectation pour les 
12èmes étudiants de catégorie. Les étudiants sont requis de 
lire une histoire prescrite et de récrire les rubriques 
d'ending.Includes pour l'évaluation du projet.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A lição planeia para uma atribuição para 1òs 
estudantes da classe. Os estudantes são requeridos ler uma 
história prescrita e reescrever os rubrics de ending.Includes para a 
avaliação do projeto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La lezione progetta per un'assegnazione per i 
dodicesimi allievi del grado. Gli allievi sono tenuti a leggere 
una storia prescritta ed a riscrivere le rubriche di ending.Includes 
per la valutazione del progetto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σχέδια μαθήματος για μια ανάθεση για τους 12$ους 
σπουδαστές βαθμού. Οι σπουδαστές πρέπει για να διαβάσουν 
μια ορισμένη ιστορία και να ξαναγράψει το τελείωμα περιλαμβάνει 
τις ρουμπρίκες για την αξιολόγηση του προγράμματος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La lección planea para una asignación para los 
12mos estudiantes del grado. Requieren a los estudiantes leer 
una historia prescrita y reescribir las rúbricas de ending.Includes 
para el gravamen del proyecto.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Messwert</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Textverständnis</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">schriftlicher Ausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Kompetenzeinschätzung.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">lecture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">compréhension des textes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">expression écrite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">évaluation de compétence.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">leitura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">compreensão de texto</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">expressão escrita</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">avaliação do competence.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">lettura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">comprensione del testo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">espressione scritta</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">valutazione di competenza.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">ανάγνωση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κατανόηση κειμένων</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γραπτή έκφραση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">αξιολόγηση της ικανότητας.</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">gravamen de la capacidad.</string>
          </keyword>
